cern.ais.gridwars.bot

Interface PlayerBot


  • public interface PlayerBot

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getNextCommands(UniverseView universeView, java.util.List<MovementCommand> movementCommands)
      This method is called on every turn for this player in order to get its movement commands.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextCommands

        void getNextCommands(UniverseView universeView,
                   java.util.List<MovementCommand> movementCommands)
        This method is called on every turn for this player in order to get its movement commands.
        Parameters:
        universeView - Provides information about the current status of the game.
        movementCommands - Empty list to which the player is expected to add his movements.
